title: S4 Ep9: Fast Food Wars with D'Andra Simmons: Thursday, January 14th, 2021

description:
• Armie Hammer will 'step away' from Jennifer Lopez movie amid DMs scandal (Page Six)
  • New season of 'Real Housewives of New Jersey' takes on cheating allegations (Page Six)
  • Anne Hathaway Says She Wants to Be Called "Anything" But Her Own Name (E! Online)
  • Trevor Noah & Minka Kelly 'Making Plans for a Future Together' as He Buys $27.5M Mansion: Source (PEOPLE)
